\N<Segi>...
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...So you've come. This will be your fourth battle today.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>As you may already know, we'll need to process a temporary
exemption for your husband Yuia's charges. Please present
the relevant documents.

\N<Segi>I... understand. There's no need for further guidance...
I'll change into the black clothes and head to the waiting
room.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Haha, no need for guidance, huh? Have you become a seasoned
warrior already?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>In fact... I'm a bit perplexed myself. What are you enduring
this for? What drives you to go this far?

\N<Segi>Such things... are, of course, decided. For my husband...
for my son. As a wife, as a mother, I believe that's what
I'm supposed to do...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>I see... Pride as a wife and a mother, huh? It seems that in
your case, you also possess pride as a woman.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Otherwise, it doesn't make sense. Since the inception of the
training troops, I've seen many women like you administered
with Mind Lyuda and step onto the battlefield.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But their outcomes were splendid. Each woman exposed herself
to such shame that it made you want to look away, and they
fell to become Lyuda's mistresses.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>For their husbands, for their lovers, or perhaps for their
families. All of them sang similar themes to yours but
eventually broke down.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Haha... What about you? Will you stop here like the other
women, or will you push through the unseen thorny path and
move forward?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Your battle and the path you should take... I shall observe
with great interest.

\N<Man>To win in the training tournament, strength is obviously
necessary, but knowledge of your opponents is absolutely
essential. It's not so sweet that you can win through mere
brute force alone.

\N<Man>To win in the training matches, strength is of course
